feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:55 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
